text: Jwannume jwachikululu jwangalombela ikaŵeje jwankongwe jwachigwagwa (n’jakwe) kapena jwakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), nombenajo jwankongwe jwachigwagwa jwangalombedwa ikaŵeje ni jwannume jwachikululu (n’jakwe) kapena jwakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), ni iŵele haraam yalakweyo kwa ŵakulupilila
